translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the night when it falls still!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Did He not find you unguided then guided you?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: So do not oppress the orphan,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
